title: Functions
mission_log: Automate repetitive tasks. Build a function to decrypt messages.
challenge: Define a function greet(name) that prints "Hello, <name>!".
starter_code:
# Define the greet function
def greet(name):
    print()

# Test it
greet("Neo")
hints: F-strings let you put variables in text: f"Hello, {name}!" puts the name variable inside
Make sure print is indented under the def line
